=Sysconfig=

  * Hardware: Dell Server + connected SBS-1
  * OS: Ubuntu 6.06.1 LTS + VMWare Server running W2K
  * [InstallationTutorial]

==W2K (running in VMWare Server)==

  * http://www.kinetic-avionics.co.uk/basestation.php updated to version 1.1.1.129 (Feb 08)

==Linux==
  * mysqld
  * sbstools consisting of: 
       # flightobserver.py - daemon reading data from Basestation's port #30003 and writing relevant info to database
       # flightprocessor.py - processsing (cleaning up, merging, geoclassify) flightdata, running as hourly cronjob
       # flightdatareducer.py - reduction of flight data, running as daily cronjob
